member.name: T:Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Services.AutofacContractResolver
member.summary:
Allows serialization and deserialization of objects that have dependences which are resolved using Autofac.
Source: https://www.newtonsoft.com/json/help/html/DeserializeWithDependencyInjection.htm
